title: Flints Hand
content:
Hi,

I found a PDF with a font called 'Flints Hand' on it. I have searched everywhere and could not find a way to purchase it.

Would someone be able to help me out?

Regards,  
ostorey
author: ostorey

comments.content:
[[http://www.free-fonts-ttf.org/true-type-fonts/flintshand-2839-download.htm|This one?]] Found with Google.

Also: [A hint at our Mike's site](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131004648/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html). Maybe the same font?

And read [http://typophile.com/node/1729](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131004648/http:/typophile.com/node/1729 "http://typophile.com/node/1729")

Andreas
